The rating is heavily impacted by people looking for a different kind of content. Guess what? There is a clean, SFW content on OF, too! This app showcases amazing, free content of talented content providers that use the platform to raise funds. Technically, the app works like a charm, too. So forget about those one star reviews of disappointed adult content seekers and give it a try.

OFTV has a collection of video clips that discuss fitness, beauty, makeup, and culture. The participation is low, it is supposed to be the top models/creators from the website. Very unoriginal, unrelated to what the actual OF is known for, the target demographic of OFTV is young females, not the demographic (males, 20-80) that the actual OF already appeals to.
